long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost your email campaigns' deliverability with MailGenius, the ultimate chrome extension for ensuring email deliverability. Improve your email outreach and avoid the spam folder with our comprehensive suite of tools.

MailGenius helps you identify and resolve issues that may affect your email deliverability, including:

✅ SPF Validation: Ensure your SPF record is correctly set up.
✅ DKIM Verification: Verify that your emails are properly signed with DKIM.
✅ DMARC Implementation: Confirm that your DMARC is aligned with SPF and DKIM settings.
✅ Reverse DNS Check: Ensure the sending IP matches the HELO FQDN.
✅ Domain Suffix Check: Validate your domain suffix to avoid issues with uncommon suffixes.
✅ Blacklist Monitoring: Ensure your IP, domain, or links are not listed on major blacklists.
✅ Domain Age Assessment: Evaluate the age of your domain to address deliverability challenges.
✅ Broken Links Detection: Identify and fix any non-working links in your email.
✅ Short URLs Review: Check for short links that could be marked as spam.
✅ Subject Line Optimization: Get advice on optimizing your subject line's length and structure.
✅ List Unsubscribe Header: Verify that your email includes a one-click unsubscribe option.
✅ HTML Best Practices: Analyze your email’s HTML for elements that may resemble spam.

Key Features:

🔑 Spam Analysis: Identify and resolve elements that trigger spam filters to improve email deliverability.
🔑 Real-Time Diagnostics: Access up-to-date data and personalized recommendations for your email campaigns.
🔑 User-Friendly Interface: Easily navigate powerful tools designed for both beginners and experts.
🔑 Privacy Assurance: Your data security is our priority; MailGenius ensures your email content remains confidential and secure.

MailGenius is perfect for marketers, businesses, and individuals aiming to optimize their email outreach.

Why MailGenius Chrome Extension?

⏳ Save Time: Quickly identify and fix deliverability issues with our easy-to-use tools.
📈 Improve Results: Enhance your email campaigns' effectiveness with actionable insights.
🔒 Stay Secure & Compliant: Ensure your emails follow best security practices and compliance guidelines.
